text: ==List of Rulers of the Akan state of Adanse== {| border=1 style="border- collapse: collapse" |- align=left ! width="18%"|Tenure ! width="30%"|Incumbent ! width="20%"|Notes |- valign=top |colspan="3"|Fomase Akyerekyere |- valign=top |c.1480||colspan="2"|Foundation of Fomase Akyerekyere state |- valign=top |Adabo||colspan="2"|state renamed |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |? to c.1650|| || |- valign=top |Adanse||colspan="2"|state renamed |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |c.1650 to 1700|| || |- valign=top |colspan="3"|Adansehene (Rulers) |- valign=top |colspan="3"|Ekuona dynasty |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |1700 to 1735||Nana Abu Bonsra, Adansehene|| |- valign=top |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |? to 1874||Kwadwo Oben, Adansehene||Regent |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |1874 to December 1874||Kwadwo Oben, Adansehene|| |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |December 1874 to February 1876||Interregnum|| |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |February 1876 to 1886||Kwaku Nansa Berofon, Adansehene|| |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |ante/c.1950 to post/c.1950||Kwadwo Amoako Agyeman, Adansehene|| |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |ante/c.1960 to post/c.1960||Adjaye Bonsra II, Adansehene|| |} ==See also== *Ghana *Gold Coast *Lists of office-holders Category:Government of Ghana Rulers Category:Lists of African rulers
title: List of rulers of the Akan state of Adanse
